About me

I am currently (2019/11/02) a senior student at Haverford College majoring in Physics. I am also an admitted candidate for the Electrical & Systems Engineering Master Program at Penn. I enjoy learning new things, especially sports. I have done rock climbing, surfing, shooting range and hunting in United States. I haven't tried out sky diving yet so it is on my to-do list. Oh I also play Dota2, currently a legend 4 player. If people ask about my favourite thing, I will say my favourite book is The Count of Monte Cristo.
